mapper.select: SELECT board_number, board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_photo, board_date FROM bumoim.groupboard
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bumoim.groupboard ( board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_photo, board_date ) VALUES ( #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer}, #{board_photo}, CURDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE bumoim.groupboard SET board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content} WHERE board_number = #{board_number}
